title: Vi has the number of the beast on her right leg in new Skin
body:
Just noticed Vi has her name written 3 times running down her right leg in her new Demon Vi skin.

You can see it clearly in her splash at http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/10/106-pbe-update.html

as a Vi main i'm ashamed of myself for forgetting her name is also the Roman Numeral 6, and that it translates into her having 666 down her leg.

i'm terrible. {{champion:32}} 

even worse though is we can have a champ with the number of the beast on her model and splash but {{champion:104}}  cant have a damn cigar.

replies.body: Didn't even realize it. looks like I will never be using this skin.

but that's the thing. it's all in the joke. Vi's been around for years and many people have wanted and suggested a Hell Boy themed skin for her as well. i'm sure there are one or two you could easily find on deviant art right now.

So how could Riot not slip in the little Joke of using her name for a reference to the symbol of the beast when it's just her named written down her leg 3 times?

She's a demon in this skin, a beast reference is almost a given, and almost no attraction is drawn to it due to her still having her iconic tattoo under her eye and her name on her back as well.

I find it to be a clever little mini easter egg and nothing more. i'm wasn't naive enough to think all would like it, but credit must be given for sly reference.

I didn't say that the skin wasn't well done nor the easter egg of "Vi Vi Vi" not clever, because it is. The thing is, it is actually offensive to a large group of people. Cigarettes aren't offensive, there is really nothing to be offended about, but referencing the beast on a skin is practically anti-christian. I'm not going to call for the skin to be pulled, I'm simply going to ignore and not support it, like a normal person should should something irk them.

Satan is an unremovable part of Christianity, so including this is more of a nod to and acknowledge of Cristianity and isn't not Anti Christian. Dumbass uneducated back water inbred Christians like you don't even realize that.

I really don't know why you decided to be so insulting. And you basically stated what i said, that it's anti christian. Grammar nazi aside, Whether its a nod or not, it is not in a direction any Christian would see fitting. I simply stated I won't support the skin, I don't understand your need to throw yourself into this conversation to bad mouth.
It's hard to derive context from text, reading your post, I imagined you a bit more zealty. But you clearly don't seem to be, making an ass out of myself. Sorry for that, mate.
it's all good, apology accepted. thanks :)

People like you are the reason Graves got nerfed to death.
RIP Cigar
